group_1.textLeft: Oh, goodness. Sorry for all the trouble.
If only you'd put my address down for the@shipping.

group_1.textRight: It's not like you were there to tell us.@I don't know the address to this place.
We had no reason to think that you wouldn't@be there to help.

group_1.textLeft: My, really?
I really had no intention of joining from the@start.

group_1.textRight: I seem to recall someone urging us to@go buy hiking gear...
Oh wait, it was you, Mitama!

group_1.textLeft: Goodness! There's no need to get so upset@with me, is there?
Honestly, you hotblooded kids are too@much for me...
I wonder if this is what you call@young people angst.

group_1.textRight: But you're always talking about how you're@the same age as us.

group_1.textLeft: All right, all right. [chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]Everything worked out,@didn't it?
Everyone's back safe and sound. Plus we got@this big bag of rice.

group_1.textRight: Actually, you're the only one who benefits@from the reward.

group_1.textLeft: Well, if you come visit I'll be sure to treat@you to some.

group_1.textRight: No, thank you. I've heard stories of your@cooking.

group_1.textLeft: Nooo, that can't be right. Who would say such@a cruel thing?
I can't stand false rumors like that.
Well, I'm sure something good came of it.@You're glad you went, aren't you?
I mean that you two were able to go hiking@together.

group_1.textRight: [chara:301601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yeah, that's right! It was great! We had a@blast!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*
In that case Masara, you owe me a big one.
This all started with her.
She told me hiking was your favorite memory.
That's why she wanted to go with you.

group_1.textRight: That...is a bit of an exaggeration...

group_1.textLeft: Me? Exaggerate? Don't be silly.
It was nothing...

group_1.textRight: This is what we bought those sneakers for!

group_1.textLeft: I...probably won't go.
The sneakers... They're already all beat up@and dirty.

group_1.textRight: We can pick up some new sneakers for you@sometime!

group_1.narration: Hiking with my family had been@my most precious memory all this time.@Nothing seemed to help me let go.
With your super clumsy kindness,@you found a broken place in my heart@and fixed it for me. Thank you.
I hope in the future...you'll give me more@new favorite memories, again and again.
